website_summaries.verdict: Every bit as functional as it is stylish, this expertly crafted bellows will earn its permanent place by the fireplace from the moment it rekindles its first flame.
pros: Artificial leather loop for easy hanging
Decorative gold rivets and nozzle look great
cons: A little on the pricey side, but it’s a high-quality fireplace bellows

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Blows!
customer_reviews.text: But like, in a good way. If you're in the market for one of these, don't buy one of those laminate jobs, buy real wood, it will last way longer. Totally satisfied with this purchase and glad to not be sticking my face in the fire any more!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Deininger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bellows. Helps the inexperienced fire person to get things going again. Makes the coals nice and hot! My only concern is that the "leather" portion will melt or break quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Harlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wood stove we lose power a lot so we'll get lots of use out if this.. Really good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Alicia hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The bellows is beautiful to look at and works very well. Glad we bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and works great! Not to large and not to small.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. He loves building fires in our fireplace and was so happy when he received this. The bellows works well. We also have an outdoor fire ring that he uses it with. Love the workmanship on it. The carving is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: It Tore the First Night I Used It
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke. It tore the first night I used it. It’s made of very cheap material. I strongly suggest not buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Good for a  blowing fire job
customer_reviews.text: It’s very well constructed and doing great job blowing Air
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Carving added a touch of craftsmanship. Very nice quality. Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: p. shermin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bellows-just right for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: With our new fireplace insert, this bellows works well. It is functional and looks nice with the other tools.
customer_reviews.author: AmyC

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats putting my head in the fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Its plenty big for the fireplace and I can continue to breathe normally.
customer_reviews.author: aleen chan

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: not bad for a small bellow. Would work well with a chimney
customer_reviews.author: TJH

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Product did not last 1 month of use. Very poorly made. Do Not order this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful carving & lovely warm honey wood! Looks smashing hanging on the side of our fireplace!!! ... and the bellows work like a charme...easy to use... just a couple of gentle blows and the sparks catch.
customer_reviews.author: Kat C.

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointing craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I used the bellow twice and it is coming apart at the hinge already. I would suspect a few more times of usage will necessitate me throwing it away. VERY disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Walter Leicher

customer_reviews.title: Look Great and Work Just as Well
customer_reviews.text: We got this as an addition to our fireplace tools and these bellows aren't just decorative; they've made starting and feeding my fires a walk in the park! Be sure to make these an addition to your set!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good quality bellows this one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: T P Graf

customer_reviews.title: Works well and what I  needed.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for my woodstove. Works well and as expected. Bought a few months ago and use it when needed. I would buy this again if I need to replace it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Just as it was described. Works great, looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Bellows great value
customer_reviews.text: The Bellows looked and worked better than expected , I use it all the time . Works great for my outdoor fire pit also G
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carvajal

customer_reviews.title: Nice flow of air.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It’s just the beginning of the season so we’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: One well made fireplace tool, just what we needed for our fireplace. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Aim it sideways into the fire!
customer_reviews.text: It is very good doing its task. Gets the fire started and restarts one going out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman’s is great! This was perfect when BBQ’n and starting the fire up after adding more coal or wood.
customer_reviews.author: Roland_C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Works great, high quality of workmanship & materials. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great fit and finish. A great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roy L. Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well and blows pretty strong. We have had it for now couple of months and no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for our fire pit and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bellows!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bellows I have owned. Really issues a blast of air. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Vandagriff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product! I used it for my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Belton Hudley

customer_reviews.title: small size
customer_reviews.text: I should have got a larger one, this works OK
customer_reviews.author: Front Royal, VA

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received fire bellow in the mail with in 1 day, that’s the fastest I ever received anything before. It was nicely packaged, ver impressive, to my surprise it is very well made, not to heavy and not to light in weight. I’m sorry to say I have not had a chance to use it yet, but I’m a couple months I’ll probably be using it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina bendzsa

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bellows, we've used for a month with no problems. The ones I grew up with are around 50% bigger, though. That doesn't mean much, except for the air volume per push. Multiple small pushes rather than a few large ones get the job done. This is as nice as it looks online, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this regularly and have no problem at all. Yes, it could be higher quality, but the quality is just fine for my use. No broken parts, no cracks, priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and really works. I like how it has a hanger for it so you can hang it with your fireplace tools.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This bellows looks good and works well. It blows a good stream of air that really helps the fire catch, and it looks good hanging under the mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We got this after our old on got a hole in the leather. This one was great. I LOVE the smell of real leather.
customer_reviews.author: DearMammaBlogger

customer_reviews.title: Great fire starter
customer_reviews.text: This thing really puts out the air. Great way to restart a fire when you still have some coals. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Hollar

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my fire place. Gives enough air to help me keep the fire going. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually used it, but can tell it will do the job
customer_reviews.author: Bill Carson

customer_reviews.title: bellows
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Adds just enough "poof" to keep the fire going without adding more kindling.
customer_reviews.author: regina lipman

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set of bellows. Very well made, and they look awesome hanging next to our fireplace. For the price, these are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

product_meta.title: TJ.MOREE Fireplace Bellows Indoor 19"x 8" Large Wood Fire Blower with Hanging Strap, Long Handle, Metal Nozzle, Great Tool for Fireplace, Fire Pit, Wood Stove, BBQ, Outdoor Camping
feature_bullets: Durable Material: Dimensions 19" X 8". Exquisite wooden surface, zinc-cast metal nozzle, crafted from rubber wood and heat-resistant artificial leather, combined with rivets.

Easy to Use & Store: The bellows cleanly and easily pushes air out through the nozzle, largely reducing the risk of getting smoke in the eyes. It can be hung on the fireplace tool stand and stored beside the fireplace, chimney, wood stove.
Decoration: The fireplace bellows is beautiful but functional; it adds a decorative touch to your fireplace and brings the perfect rustic country style to your home.

Multipurpose and Useful Gift Idea: Perfectly-sized to fit comfortably in your hands, it is suited for use with barbecue grills, fire pits, campfires and indoor fireplaces. The bellows also make an ideal housewarming gift for a home with a fireplace.
Rest Assured Purchase: If any part of your has been less perfect. Please contact us, we will solve the problem within 24 hours. We promise to do everything in our power to meet your experience.
